plot: The daughter of Hong Kong's Rogue Cop and her quest to find the one who murdered her mother. One lead to the next, she simultaneously uncovers the truth behind her father's infamous case.
title: Shades of Rogue
plot_es: The daughter of Hong Kong's Rogue Cop and her quest to find the one who murdered her mother. One lead to the next, she simultaneously uncovers the truth behind her father's infamous case.
plot_en: The daughter of Hong Kong's Rogue Cop and her quest to find the one who murdered her mother. One lead to the next, she simultaneously uncovers the truth behind her father's infamous case.
